FB95E6A36A6C434093A091C9F8A939C9.description: The student will demonstrate appropriate adjustments when approaching controlled and uncontrolled intersections, curves, work zones, railroad crossings, and hills with line-of-sight or path-of-travel limitations. Key concepts/skills include:

F3A2F22F56F742B788FFDCF7944234A0.description: a.	demonstrating targeting and tracking skills;

3FC21DD0E8D34B59807DE7D75CF216F7.description: The student will recognize the effects of momentum, gravity, and inertia on vehicle control and balance, and the relationship between kinetic energy and force of impact. Key concepts/skills include:
